channel.title: Client jarring problems
channel.description:
No one ever goes to client help section to help so ill just ask here ok so now that it read my main class how on earth am i suppose to get this jar file turned into a webclient because i used the dropbox public link and i made my own applet But now when i publish my site and go on site it shows my server but it also shows error connecting for details on a white screen top left corner how can i fix this <
!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN"> My Applet Page Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/

/bye
